contents: @Attackontitan:报道原文：A University of Pittsburgh researcher “on the verge” of a breakthrough in understanding the coronavirus was found shot dead in his home, according to a report，和 The university described him as an “outstanding” and “prolific” researcher who was nearing completion of important work related to COVID-19.这足以说明此人即将在研究新冠病毒方面取得重大突破，很可能释出不利于中共的研究结果。怎么就一普通研究员了？？
